reviews.text: i stayed here on business and found it to be as good as most other premier inns . clean , efficient , and a very good breakfast , i would recommend .
reviews.title: another good one from premier again

reviews.text: A quick check in, very good range of meals & drinks and friendly, helpful staff.
reviews.title: Friendly & convenient

reviews.text: We stayed here for a Saturday night as it was a friend's birthday. All aspects of the hotel were as good as I've come to expect from the mounting number of Premier Inns I've stayed in.
reviews.title: Very friendly staff

reviews.text: The rooms were very clean and tidy, every interaction with a staff member was friendly and helpful, and breakfast was very good.
reviews.title: Excellent for site seeing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did have a little confrontation with some local youths at the entrance on our return from a party just after midnight but this was not the fault of Premier Inn and the staff helped me to sort the problem.
reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin

reviews.text: had a real good experience stayed for the week end, staff was superb and as it has a pubb resteraunt attached had breakfast and dinner there the food was good but a special mention to the staff in a word fantastic waitress especially smiley happy frendley what more could you want
reviews.title: premier inn bodmin

reviews.text: My husband and I were attending a meeting in the vicinity so we booked into the Premier Inn for two nights. We found our room clean and tidy, the bathroom a decent size with a shower that was easy to use and plenty of hot water. The bed was very roomy and the pillows soft and comfy. The only minus point was the lighting in the room - not terribly bright to read comfortably. But that was a small point considering the very reasonable price we paid!
reviews.title: Couldn't have been better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The TableTable restaurant within the Inn had a fairly extensive menu for lunch/dinner use and all dishes were reasonably priced. Breakfast was excellent with very good choice of either cooked or continental - eat as much as you like!! What I particularly liked was that the majority of staff were young, but very well trained. It was good to see so many youngsters with a job in an area of the country where jobs are hard to find. We travel to Cornwall fairly often, and we will certainly be staying here again.
reviews.title: does what it says on the tin

reviews.text: Advantage of Premier Inn is that you know what you get, and the standard is good. This hotel is a good base for N & S Cornwall visiting. Top tip - make a fuss about the pillows if you don't like them. I didn't and my neck hurts!!
reviews.title: hotel

reviews.text: good hotel. very helpfull , restaurant next door very good and fantastic food. get the rooms near reception, you can pick up the free wi-fi if you need it, otherwise in other rooms you have to pay, dont tell anyone about this hahha,
reviews.title: Just what we needed

reviews.text: Apart from an unreasonable delay checking in I found the hotel to be just as expected - good value; convenient for the meeting I was attending; clean and comfortable. Would use again.
reviews.title: good value and convenient

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We often stay in Premier Inns and will continue to do so even after a mediocre stay in Bodmin,Cornwall, last weekend. On the plus side, the room was very spacious and clean and the staff very attentive and welcoming. However, the bed was terribly uncomfortable ( I had back ache for 24 hours afterwards)- the staff gladly refunded my fee under the company's 'Good Night Guarantee'- well done,,,no fuss at all. The restaurant has a disco in the bar to 12 mid night on Friday evenings which can be heard in the bedrooms nearest to the Restaurant, especially if you need the window open. On the morning we had breakfast, there had been a party the night before and the floor was littered with streamers, cracker novelties and food was all under the serving table...needed a vacuum:). Having said all this, the staff of young girls were attentive, polite and willing to help. We will use Premier Inn again, but not Bodin branch.
reviews.title: Great staff-but...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here beginning of November. Staff very friendly and helpful. Well situated for getting out and about. Next door to ASDA but did not find it affected us. Table Table restaurant attached with this Inn, which gives well priced food and drink making for a pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Premier Inn, Premier stay

reviews.text: very nice Premier inn, great location in the heart of cornwall easy to get to all attractions from hotel. Hotel location easy to find straight off A30 near to asda, food was brilliant value for money, recommend having evening meal and breakfast package great value for money, all staff we met where brillant very helpful - a very clean hotel and rooms
reviews.title: very relaxing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints with our stay here. All the staff were both friendly and helpful and the cost of our stay and the food was very good value. The only small complaint, as I notice has been pointed out by other guests, is the lighting by the bed. It is so low that it makes it difficult to read. A small complaint though.
reviews.title: Premier Inn Bodmin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great Budget hotel very warm and cosy especially as we arrived in the rain and mist, great staff and lovely restaurant attached, great for a few nights stay
reviews.title: Premiere Inn Bodmin, lovely cosy warm hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my other half stayed for one night at this P.I in August.Last minute decision after leaving another Cornish BB because of noise.Arrived late after phoning for a room first.Found it a little tricky to find but it was late at night.Phoned for directions -reception chap very helpful.Quickly checked in on arrival.Lovely room-immaculate very spacious-smelt lovely.great night sleep-lovely power shower.What I liked most was the silence-never heard anything and i`m a light sleeper!.left early the next morning to continue our travels.We tend to use Premier inns when ever we can because of the great rooms and the great staff.Other hotels BB`s could use some of the premier inn training the staff receive.Wonderful-look forward to my next P.I stay!!
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: stayed here again for a weekend, tried other places always come back to this one as we have family in bodmin, so comfortable, rooms clean and comfortable, food fantastic, bar and restaurant great. cannot ask for more. if you are near the asda warehouse close the window and use the fan, its not that noisy!! even having asda there is convenient for insomniacs, i have walked around it before at 11pm after a good meal !!
reviews.title: lovely ...as always

reviews.text: My family and i stayed here on our way to Newquay. We wanted to break up our journey and chose Bodmin as it is somewhere we had never visited. We chose the Premier Inn as it is a brand we are very familiar with and have been very satisfied with previous stays in other areas. Unfortunately the Premier Inn in Bodmin was very disappointing, damp musty smell throughout the hotel, which was itself looking rather tired and in need of some attention. I'm sure there must be some sort of explanation, we didn't hang around long enough to find out.
reviews.title: Not What You Would Expect for a Premier Inn

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights and were impressed with all aspects of the hotel. We had stayed a few years ago and the improvement since then was immense. The staff were friendly , helpful and the rooms were clean and comfortable, the bed was so comfortable. The staff helped to arranged a 'Birthday Breakfast' for my daughter-in-Law without any hesitation at all and made it special. We frequently visit Bodmin and will definitely use the hotel again now we have rediscovered it.
reviews.title: Couldn't fault it
